Give at least 1 keyword or 1 sentence about our lesson. Play Recording Recording status Please stop the recording first by pressing the mic icon again. Recording your answer… Playing recorded answer… Thank you for that answer! Done recording.
Play your answer! CODE NO.		CORE COMPETENCIES CODE NO.	COMMON COMPETENCIES CODE NO.		BASIC COMPETENCIES The DRIVING (Passenger Bus/Straight Truck) NC III Qualification consists of competencies that a person must achieve to drive/operate buses/straight trucks classified under LTO Restriction codes 3 up to 5 on highways; transport passengers and/or heavy goods, liquids and materials over specified long or short distances; comply with local traffic rules/ regulations and ordinances and perform minor repairs on the assigned vehicle. 

This Qualification is packaged from the competency map of the Automotive/Land Transport sector as shown in Annex A. 

The Units of Competency comprising this Qualification include the following: •Passenger Bus Driver 
 •Straight Truck Driver Confirm I Understand This shows how well or poor you have performed based on the scores and number of retries you made for each module. Keep learning and become a more knowledgeable trucker! No recently recorded recitation. You have exited the current test. Your score is 0 for this attempt. In partnership with QuickTrans Cargo Moving, Inc., located in Tondo, Manila, the Technological Institute of the Philippines Quezon City - College of Information Technology and Education (TIPQC - CITE) developed DRIVER.PH-TruckerLearningPH, a mobile learning application under the project: "Drivers Roadworthiness Improvement Verification Education Readiness for the Philippine Logistics Industry", that aims to educate and evaluate both professional and non-professional licensed vehicle drivers using categorized learning modules, videos, and tests that will enable them to be professionally competent and fully equipped with the essential knowledge of what a truck driver is expected to possess and apply in the trucking industry and on the road. The materials used in the application were derived from the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority (TESDA) competency standards and guidelines for TESDA NC III Driving (Passenger Bus/Straight Truck) certification. This mobile app is developed by a group of 4th Year BSIT Students of TIPQC - CITE.
